core.userGoalStatement: As a Senior IT/Operational Executive in a BENELUX public sector agency, I am committed to leveraging technology to deliver efficient, secure, and citizen-centric public services while ensuring compliance with a complex regulatory landscape and modernizing our legacy infrastructure.
core.coreBelief: I believe that strategic investment in modern, secure, and interoperable technology, coupled with a data-driven approach and strong partnerships, is essential to transform public services, meet the evolving needs of our citizens and businesses, and ensure the long-term resilience and efficiency of our public institutions.
core.contentImplication: Content must reflect the executive's dedication to modernization and resilience, emphasizing solutions as secure, efficient enablers of trusted public administration.

items: Strategic Digital Transformation & Modernization
Operational Management & Service Delivery
Regulatory Compliance & Cybersecurity
Budget & Resource Management
Data Governance & Utilization
Citizen Experience Enhancement
Vendor & Partner Management
responsibilities.contentImplication: Directly align content with the executive's key responsibility areas, highlighting how solutions aid in cyber risk management and citizen satisfaction improvement.

items: Cloud (especially sovereign cloud), Cybersecurity, Data Analytics, AI, Application Modernization, Legacy Systems management
BENELUX and EU regulatory landscape (GDPR, NIS2, DORA, EU AI Act, Data Act, BIO)
Public sector procurement, budget cycles, financial management
Change management, digital strategies and funding mechanisms
